name: Abstract Hell
description: Abstract Hell is a realm of many hostile creatures made of simple lines, curves, and light, and they're bent on destroying you while you navigate the treacherous mazes collecting tokens to advance to the next level. Become overwhelmed in a variety of waysâ€”sheer numbers, shifting environments, and various pranks.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz dual-core or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 capable GPU Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Satisfactory performance on iGPUs cannot be guaranteed
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz dual-core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 capable GPU Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Satisfactory performance on iGPUs cannot be guaranteed
